fabriccloud.system.configureNginx(verbose=False)[source]¶

Configures nginx to use the configuration file in ./manage/config

fabriccloud.system.disableApp(appname)[source]¶

Disables an app, provided as by parameter

fabriccloud.system.enableApp(appname)[source]¶

Takes an app located in the server/apps folder and configures nginx, supervisor, and pip to run it

fabriccloud.system.installApache(verbose=False)[source]¶

Installs apache 2 + mod_wsgi for serving python apps

fabriccloud.system.installConda(verbose=False)[source]¶

Installs miniconda installation (requires user interaction)

fabriccloud.system.installElasticsearch(verbose=False)[source]¶

Installs elasticsearch

fabriccloud.system.installMongoDB(verbose=False)[source]¶

Installs MongoDB with default authentication

fabriccloud.system.installNginx(verbose=False)[source]¶

Installs nginx + extras
